law.catch_line: A local government qualifies for participation in the Program if:...

text.section:
A local government qualifies for participation in the Program if:
the local government has:
a 5-year consolidated plan approved by the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development; or
a comprehensive plan;
the plans listed in item (1) of this subsection:
have a workforce housing element;
assess workforce housing needs; and
contain goals, objectives, and policies to preserve or develop workforce housing; and
the local government provides a statement to the Department indicating:
a desire to participate in the Program; and
a reasonable expectation of the local government's ability to provide the matching funds required under § 4-1804 of this subtitle.
